android_ioctl.h

1 #ifndef HALIDE_RUNTIME_ANDROID_IOCTL_H
2 #define HALIDE_RUNTIME_ANDROID_IOCTL_H
3 
4 #define _IOC_NRBITS 8
5 #define _IOC_TYPEBITS 8
6 #define _IOC_SIZEBITS 14
7 #define _IOC_DIRBITS 2
8 
9 #define _IOC_NRMASK ((1 << _IOC_NRBITS) - 1)
10 #define _IOC_TYPEMASK ((1 << _IOC_TYPEBITS) - 1)
11 #define _IOC_SIZEMASK ((1 << _IOC_SIZEBITS) - 1)
12 #define _IOC_DIRMASK ((1 << _IOC_DIRBITS) - 1)
13 
14 #define _IOC_NRSHIFT 0
15 #define _IOC_TYPESHIFT (_IOC_NRSHIFT + _IOC_NRBITS)
16 #define _IOC_SIZESHIFT (_IOC_TYPESHIFT + _IOC_TYPEBITS)
17 #define _IOC_DIRSHIFT (_IOC_SIZESHIFT + _IOC_SIZEBITS)
18 
19 #define _IOC_NONE 0U
20 #define _IOC_WRITE 1U
21 #define _IOC_READ 2U
22 
23 #define _IOC(dir, type, nr, size) (((dir) << _IOC_DIRSHIFT) | ((type) << _IOC_TYPESHIFT) | ((nr) << _IOC_NRSHIFT) | ((size) << _IOC_SIZESHIFT))
24 
25 #define _IO(type, nr) _IOC(_IOC_NONE, (type), (nr), 0)
26 #define _IOR(type, nr, data) _IOC(_IOC_READ, (type), (nr), (sizeof(data)))
27 #define _IOW(type, nr, data) _IOC(_IOC_WRITE, (type), (nr), (sizeof(data)))
28 #define _IOWR(type, nr, data) _IOC(_IOC_READ | _IOC_WRITE, (type), (nr), (sizeof(data)))
29 
30 #define _IOR_BAD(type, nr, data) _IOC(_IOC_READ, (type), (nr), sizeof(data))
31 #define _IOW_BAD(type, nr, data) _IOC(_IOC_WRITE, (type), (nr), sizeof(data))
32 #define _IOWR_BAD(type, nr, data) _IOC(_IOC_READ | _IOC_WRITE, (type), (nr), sizeof(data))
33 
34 #define _IOC_DIR(nr) (((nr) >> _IOC_DIRSHIFT) & _IOC_DIRMASK)
35 #define _IOC_TYPE(nr) (((nr) >> _IOC_TYPESHIFT) & _IOC_TYPEMASK)
36 #define _IOC_NR(nr) (((nr) >> _IOC_NRSHIFT) & _IOC_NRMASK)
37 #define _IOC_SIZE(nr) (((nr) >> _IOC_SIZESHIFT) & _IOC_SIZEMASK)
38 
39 #define IOC_IN (_IOC_WRITE << _IOC_DIRSHIFT)
40 #define IOC_OUT (_IOC_READ << _IOC_DIRSHIFT)
41 #define IOC_INOUT ((_IOC_WRITE | _IOC_READ) << _IOC_DIRSHIFT)
42 #define IOCSIZE_MASK (_IOC_SIZEMASK << _IOC_SIZESHIFT)
43 #define IOCSIZE_SHIFT (_IOC_SIZESHIFT)
44 
45 #endif
